name: Dwell Crate
subtitle: dog house | side table
description:
Finally—a dog crate that accentuates your modern style! You’ll love this dual-purpose cabinet with its sleek modern lines and innovative door storage system. It’s now easy to turn your pet’s cozy space into a secure dog den. Say goodbye to your old plastic eyesore.

For safety, remove all collars and leashes before securing pet in crate.

details.title: Features
content: Includes removable 2" foam bed with washable fleece cover
Handcrafted with 3/4" Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Removable sliding door for safely securing your pet
Rear stowaway for sliding door when not in use
Holes on either side allow for ventilation and easy moving

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote

pinitcaption: Dwell Crate, dog house | side table
